title: 'Bass and audio quality'
body: 'Pros: 1)Nice bass 2)Clear audio quality 3)Nice battery backup based on volume level 4)Easy to use 5)Built quality excellent and sturdy 6) Can connect to multiple devices and shift between them 7)Party boost button can connect multiple speakers  Cons: 1)No option to change the song 2)No microphone cant use for calls or video conferences'

title: 'Nice speaker
body: '4.0 out of 5 stars'Nice product with great sound, (off course it's JBL) worth buying. Easy to pair. The sound quality is awesome. I am in love with this speaker.

title: 'JBL never disappoints'
body: 'The media could not be loaded. The quality of sound is amazing. U can expect no less than superior quality sound. Battery is promising as said. The charger u use is more important. Please use normal charger or not more than 33w charger battery life will reduce if we use higher than those mentioned. Even this is water-resistant please avoid using it wet. Quality mesh power socket and buttons. And please dont press the bass area with hands. Let it hop with music : )'

title: 'Very good product
body: '4.0 out of 5 stars''Good sound quality Good connectivity. Comes with party boost feature which if you have another speaker with the feature can be paired and makes a stereo set. A little pricey but comes with JBL tag.'

title: 'Sound Quality'
body: 'It is good at 50%-60% volume bass and treble combination is too good.. But after increasing above 60% volume combination of bass and treble is not good. The Bass starts bursting.'

title: 'Good'
body: 'Good'

title: 'Good Speaker'
body: 'Crisp sound'

title: 'Nice and loud but no mic.'
body: 'The JBL Flip 5 speaker is nice and loud with 20 watts for sound but it has no mic so you cannot speak into it with your mobile phone. If you want one with a mic then buy the JBL GO or JBL Flip 4. They both have mics. The sound on the Flip 5 is wonderful and bass is really good. If you are going only for sound it’s a great buy.'

title: 'BEST Speaker for around 6k'
body: 'The size is perfect! And the effect is just toooo good! For this small a size the base is terrific. Portable and easy to carry. Go for it!!'

body: My review after using it for 3 months Sound quality is really really good Charge - I charge it once a week/10 days since I use it for 30-45 minutes a week with moderate volume you can go for it if your budget is around 6k and don't want to compromise on the sound quality

title: 'Compact device for all audio needs.'
body: The battery literally never seen to run down, as it it put on charge after prolonged use. It is compact, portable and very useful accompniment while working in the house. Good quality and connectivity in the entire house. Had been missing it so long. The only Con is it's price, which would keep it out of reach of many prospective users.

body: 'This is a wonderful speaker. Very very balanced sound. Base does not affect other notes so it’s feels very premium. It can get very loud I use it not more than 30-40% sound capacity and that’s why it is giving a superb battery backup. Overall extremely happy with the purchase.'
